attributes.action: Dissolution of Government and the forming of a new political system
attributes.additional_details:
It is becoming more and more obvious that the current system of government is out dated and out of touch with the people. To say we are living in a fair democracy is a laughable concept. The people have no voice.
The world is changing and systems of governance should change in line with this.
I call for the immediate dissolution of government and real debate on the right direction to proceed. I have my own opinions on this, as i'm sure you all do. Is it not therefore the right thing to do to debate these choices. Move forward as a society together for a better future. Enough living in the shadow of overbearing, untrustworthy and out of touch elitists. I call for real change.
